DOC.brief_title: Compensatory Cognitive Training Clinical High Risk Latino Youth
DOC.detailed_description: This 12 week randomize study compare Compensatory Cognitive Training ( CCT ) versus Recreational Therapy ( RT ) Latino clinical high risk individual US Mexico . Study participant measure 3 time , baseline , 12 24 week outcome measure . Study hypothesis : Study participant receive CCT show significant improvement 12 24 week compare baseline 1 ) Neurocognition use Global Cognitive Index z score derived MATRICS neurocognitive domain score , 2 ) Functional Capacity assess UCSD Performance-based Skills Assessment ( UPSA/UPSA-Adolescent ) , 3 ) Self-Rated Functioning measure Specific Level Functioning Scale ( SLoF ) 4 ) Clinical symptom rating measure Scale Prodromal Symptoms ( SOPS ) total score compare subject receive RT training across study time .
